message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $200. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $150 for it. Would you be able to meet me halfway?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $150 is too low for me.  Could you do $180? I'm trying to find a fair price.

Hello Alice, I understand your position, but I believe $180 is still quite high. I would like to stick to my initial offer of $150. However, if you're open to negotiating further, perhaps we could meet at $160?
